channel.title: I'm new, and I'd like some advice
channel.description: Well, I'm going to admit I'm a leecher, but I'm also flat out sick of being that as well. I wish to learn how to use Scar. I read the first script section, and I would like some advice on where to go to learn more about how Scar works, I.e. more tutorials in scar tutorials. I also have a basic knowledge of Java, and am taking a class in school in it. So once I learn scar, I hope to be able to learn more java as well. Thanks in advance.

item.title: I'm new, and I'd like some advice
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Well you can follow this one and if you’d like one that explained some things more, you can follow my tut here(exactly the same as the SRL TypeSend procedure).

Read full topic
